citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:45 pm to
1:15 pm on 14-MAY-18.
During that time, the inspector waited at the facility and called the available phone number on file leaving a
message.
